attributes.action: Reduce The Suffering of British People with regards to the Unreasonably High Duty on Fuel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Price of Fuel be that Diesel or Petrol is so High That the people of the UK are now suffering adversely. e.g. cost of food, transport and other vital services are being priced out of the reach of the ordinary citizen causing untold suffering. THE COST OF UK TAX DUTY IS DOUBLE THE COST of a litre of the Fuel it taxes. Any reasonable government that loves or cares for its people would do something!, anything! to mitigate this disgraceful situation and relieve the burden of suffering on the people. A PM that is of the people would act without the need of a petition to ensure solace for the needy and the people of the UK at large!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
